title: President to address the nation tonight (16)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President, Gotabaya Rajapaksa is scheduled to address the Nation on Wednesday (16) at 8.30 p.m night.
The President’s speech will be aired on Sirasa TV, TV1, Sirasa FM, Y FM, as well as the News 1st YouTube channel and Facebook page.
Brent, U.S. crude below $100 for the first time since late Feb
